availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Wisconsin attorney. Yarmouth, Massachusetts, native. Graduate of Dartmouth College in 1850. Graduate of Harvard Law School in 1852. Admitted to the Massachusetts bar in 1853. Moved to Milwaukee, Wisconsin, in 1857. United States District Attorney for Wisconsin from 1861 to 1866.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedule, Wisconsin, Milwaukee County, Milwaukee, p. 110; John Bear Doane Cogswell Papers, American Antiquarian Society, Manuscript Collections, (http://www.americanantiquarian.org/Findingaids/johnbeardoane_cogswell.pdf) (accessed May 10, 2017).
